subject: failure of test execution
msgSnippet: Hi All , I am having problem in executing a test using JUnit . It creates 1 test properly . But when i try to execute the test , it just stops and it gives me
messageBody:
Hi All ,

I am having problem in executing a test using JUnit .

It creates 1 test properly . But when i try to execute the test , it
just stops and it gives me an error "Test execution has failed ".
it is not giving any details abt the error also
I think tht might be the problem with some settings in my Netbeans
IDE. But I am not able to trace it out . Can anybody help me in
solving this problem ??? Wht might be the cause of this error???
